languages.text: The Rogue Trader gains a {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} +2 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} each time any creature in a 5-cell radius suffers {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

languages.text: Вольный Торговец получает {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} +2 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкости{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воле{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Общительности{/g}, когда любое существо в радиусе 5 клеток получает {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g}.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader gains a {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} +2 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} each time any creature in a 5-cell radius suffers {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Вольный Торговец получает {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} +2 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкости{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воле{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Общительности{/g}, когда любое существо в радиусе 5 клеток получает урон.

Вольный Торговец получает {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} +2 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкости{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воле{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Общительности{/g}, когда любое существо в радиусе 5 клеток получает урон.

languages.text: 自由開拓者は、周囲5セル以内の生物が{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を受けるたびに、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}連帯{/g}の{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}+2を得る。
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader gains a {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} +2 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} each time any creature in a 5-cell radius suffers {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text: ローグトレーダーは、周囲5セル以内の生物がダメージを受けるたびに、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷性{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}連帯{/g}の{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}＋2を得る。

languages.text: 每当5格内任意生物受到{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}时，行商浪人的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}社交{/g}都会提高2点。
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader gains a {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} +2 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} each time any creature in a 5-cell radius suffers {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 每当5格内任意生物受到伤害时，行商浪人的{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}社交{/g}都会提高2点。

languages.text: {mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente gana una {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} de +2 a su {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilidad{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Empatía{/g} cada vez que una criatura en un radio de 5 casillas sufre {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g}.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader gains a {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} +2 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} each time any creature in a 5-cell radius suffers {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text: {mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente gana una {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} de +2 a su {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilidad{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Empatía{/g} cada vez que una criatura en un radio de 5 casillas sufre daño.

languages.text: {mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} erhält einen {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} von +2 auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Beweglichkeit{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Gefolgschaft{/g}, wenn eine Kreatur in einem Radius von 5 Feldern {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} erleidet.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader gains a {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} +2 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} each time any creature in a 5-cell radius suffers {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Der Freihändler erhält einen {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} von +2 auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Beweglichkeit{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Gefolgschaft{/g} jedes mal, wenn eine Kreatur in einem 5-Zellen-Radius Schaden erleidet.

languages.text: {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} reçoit un {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de +2 d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilité{/g}, de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Force mentale{/g} et de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Sociabilité{/g} chaque fois qu'une créature présente dans un rayon de 5 cases subit des {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g}.

languages.text: Hür Tacir, 5 hücrelik bir yarıçap içindeki herhangi bir yaratık {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} aldığında +2 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Çeviklik{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}İrade{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Sosyallik{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonusu{/g} kazanır.
